name: FeatureCardNine
description: Scroll-based timeline feature section with two animated phone frames and centered content.

description.example: Everything you need to build amazing products
Connect your tools and workflows effortlessly. Our platform integrates with your existing systems.

imageSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc required for phoneOne (discriminated union)

videoSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc required for phoneOne (discriminated union)

imageAlt.note: Falls back to '[title] - Phone 1' if not provided

videoAriaLabel.note: Falls back to '[title] - Phone 1 video' if not provided

imageSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc required for phoneTwo (discriminated union)

videoSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc required for phoneTwo (discriminated union)

imageAlt.note: Falls back to '[title] - Phone 2' if not provided

videoAriaLabel.note: Falls back to '[title] - Phone 2 video' if not provided

itemRules.note: Each feature takes 100vh height. Recommend 2-4 features to avoid excessive scroll.

propsSchema.features: Array<{ id: number, title: string, description: string, phoneOne: ({ imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string } | { videoSrc: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }), phoneTwo: ({ imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string } | { videoSrc: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }) }>
propsSchema.showStepNumbers: boolean (required - controls whether step number badges display)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <FeatureCardNine features={[{ id: 1, title: 'Seamless Integration', description: 'Connect your tools and workflows effortlessly', phoneOne: { imageSrc: '/phone1.jpg' }, phoneTwo: { imageSrc: '/phone2.jpg' } }]} showStepNumbers={true} title="Powerful Features" description="Everything you need to build amazing products" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
dont: Do not use less than 2 items
Do not use more than 4 items
